name: ToolButton
description: A specialized button component designed for toolbars and navigation bars with icon support, tooltips, and multiple variants.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Icon content (emoji, SVG, or HTML) displayed on the button

properties.name: text
properties.description: Optional text label displayed after the icon

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: Tooltip text shown on hover (HTML title attribute)

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Visual style variant of the tool button

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether the button is disabled and cannot be clicked

properties.name: active
properties.description: Whether the button is in an active/selected state

properties.name: className
properties.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the button

properties.name: onClick
properties.description: Callback function executed when button is clicked

methods.name: setActive
methods.description: Sets the active/selected state of the button

methods.name: setDisabled
methods.description: Sets the disabled state of the button

methods.name: getElement
methods.description: Returns the DOM element of the button

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Removes the button from DOM and cleans up

events.name: dotbox-click
events.description: Fired when the tool button is clicked (Web Component only)
